title: How to get help in Windows - Microsoft Support
text: Here are a few different ways to find help for Windows - Search for help - Enter a question or keywords in the search box on the taskbar to find apps, files, settings, and get help from the web. - support.microsoft.com - Head over to support.microsoft.com/windows to find answers to more complex problems, browse support content in different categories, and contact support. - Get help - Select the Get help link when you're in Settings to learn more about the setting you're using and find answers to your questions.
